fields.name: data_date
fields.doc: The date of the log data.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when the record is last updated

fields.name: et_starttime
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when ET is started

fields.name: et_runtime
fields.doc: Number of seconds spent on ET

fields.name: load_starttime
fields.doc: ISO 8601 timestamp on when load is started

fields.name: load_runtime
fields.doc: Number of seconds spent on loading

fields.name: s3_path
fields.doc: Path to the schema used to ETL log data

fields.name: job_id
fields.doc: id of the job related to this run

fields.name: run_by
fields.doc: Username that started the ETL run

fields.name: additional_arguments
fields.doc: a json string of additional arguments used by the s3 to redshift pipeline
